com.peterverzijl.softwaresystems.qwirkle.gameengine

Class Vector2

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.peterverzijl.softwaresystems.qwirkle.gameengine.Vector2

  • public class Vector2
extends java.lang.Object
    A two dimensional vector point in space. Contains an x and a y floating point value.
    Version:
    1.0a
    Author:
    Peter Verzijl

      • lerp

        public static Vector2 lerp(Vector2 v1,
                           Vector2 v2,
                           float t)
        Interpolates linearly between two points. Uses a precise method which guarantees v = v1 at t = 1.
        Parameters:
        v1 - Vector a
        v2 - Vector b
        t - The fraction between the two vectors.
        Returns:
        The linearly interpolated vector between v1 and v2 at fraction t.

        Parameters:

        v2 - The ending vector.
        t - The fraction between 1 and 0.
